order-picked-up.message: Your order has been picked up

order-on-the-way.message: Your order is on the way

charger-not-working.message: Hi, it looks likes your charger is not working. DO you want to find other chargin stations?

checked-in.message: You have succesfully checked-in to your stay!

checked-out.message: You have succesfully checked-out from your stay!

ALL_MESSAGES.session_cleared: Your session has been cleared! You're all set to start a new one.
ALL_MESSAGES.session_and_profile_cleared: Both your session and profile have been cleared! You're ready to start fresh.
ALL_MESSAGES.route_selected: Your route is all set! Here's your navigation link: ${url}. What's next on your agenda?
ALL_MESSAGES.request_in_progress: Hang tight! We're currently processing your request...
ALL_MESSAGES.request_processed: All done! Your request has been processed and we're getting your response ready...
ALL_MESSAGES.request_failed: Oops, we hit a snag processing your request. Want to give it another shot?
ALL_MESSAGES.request_to_beckn_failed: Looks like we couldn't get that request through. How about we try something different?
ALL_MESSAGES.incident_on_road: Heads up: ${message}. Could you share your current location so I can find some alternative routes for you?
ALL_MESSAGES.formatting_failed: We had trouble understanding that instruction.
ALL_MESSAGES.api_call_failed: Oops, we ran into an issue calling the API.
ALL_MESSAGES.failed_to_process_instruction: We had trouble processing that instruction.
ALL_MESSAGES.missing_source: Mind sharing the starting point for your journey?
ALL_MESSAGES.missing_destination: Could you let us know your destination?
ALL_MESSAGES.route_list_description: Here are some route options for you. Which one do you prefer?
